description: round image of short heavy-set nude man wearing cape and crown of grape leaves and holding fruit in his PR hand and grapes in his PL hand; short grapevine on a stake at left; symbols for Libra, Scorpio and Sagittarius in sky; face blowing wind in sky at right
provenance: Private collection, United States; (Childs Gallery, Boston); acquired by MIA, 2007
title: Allegory of Autumn
